"Hatsukari": "Hell yeah! I thought you'd be up for it."
"The targets are the enemies in Dext Base. You got this?"
"Like I said before, that place really is just swarmin' with enemies."
"It'll be important to separate 'em into smaller groups so you don't get yourself surrounded."
"Make use of the terrain; support your comrades, all that stuff."
"There's that, or you could have everyone focus on the same target and just blast 'em to pieces one by one."
"Measure your strength with the strength of your enemies. Don't overextend, and you're golden."
